name: Claim your FREE BitBuddy TODAY!
description:
LIMITED TIME BONUS OFFER(!)
Use the FREE Promo Code "HATBUDDY" to put a cute little cap on your BitBuddy™. Claim your cute little cap RIGHT NOW!

Every BitBuddy™ is unique!

No refunds will be issued for this trial product. Unity 2021.2, Visual Studio, Photoshop, Computoser, GarageBand, sfxr, and Audacity were used to create this product. "Ruler Gold" and "Awe Mono Gold" fonts by Eeve Somepx were used. Your trial BitBuddy™ will be different than a subscription BitBuddy™ if you choose to subscribe.
